metadata.title: CVE-2017-18270 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 4.13.5, a local user could create keyrings forother users via keyctl commands, setting unwanted defaults or causing adenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-17-generic - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-4.13.0-17-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-4.13.0-17-lowlatency - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-17-generic - 4.13.0-17.20
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required
